<ul class="children">

<li id="comment-39240" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">07/08/2014 - 6:19 pm</div>
<p>1. Both can lower blood sugar levels. Hence diabetic persons should exercise precaution.<br />
2. In a few patients Ashwagandha can cause excess body heat and constipation.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-39240' data-commentid="39240" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-39240" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<li id="comment-39559" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">10/08/2014 - 12:52 pm</div>
<p>Hi, a blood sugar of 350 is too high to try only Guduchi as standalone medicine. At the best it may help as a co-medicine.<br />
Please consult a physician in person.</p>

<li id="comment-73934" class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a0129d9081af26e2f5292889bdae735d?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a0129d9081af26e2f5292889bdae735d?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">harpal</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">25/01/2015 - 11:03 am</div>
<p>Namaste sir, ur articles are always good and nicely presented, may we know how to make powder from fresh stems at home, what is the procedure, thanks</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-73934' data-commentid="73934" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-73934" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to harpal" aria-label='Reply to harpal'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>
<ul class="children">

<li id="comment-80205" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">28/03/2015 - 3:17 pm</div>
<p>1. Cut the stem into small pieces.<br />
2. Dry them under sunshade till it becomes totally dry.<br />
3. Pound them to prepare coarse powder.<br />
4. If it is very small amount, it can be put to mixer / grinder to make it into fine powder. If large quantities, then it may need pulverizer to make fine powder. Usually, for any herb, making fine powder at home is quite difficult, especially if the herb is fibrous.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-80205' data-commentid="80205" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-80205" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>
</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ul><!-- .children -->
</li><!-- #comment-## -->

<li id="comment-81604" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">

<p>You can simply use Guduchi powder &#8211; 2 grams, once or twice a day, along with honey / water.</p>

<li id="comment-81628" class="comment odd alt depth-2">
<div class="media">

<div class="media">

<p>The whole of Guduchi powder cannot be dissolved in anything. It can only be made into paste.</p>

<p>So very grateful for your wonderful articles. The question answer format in your mails is a very welcome start.<br />
We have Giloy plant at home. Instead of making a decoction will it be as useful to just chew on the stem. Also, is consuming it daily alright.<br />
Thanks</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-75387' data-commentid="75387" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-75387" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to satyanarayan" aria-label='Reply to satyanarayan'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<li id="comment-81605" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">18/04/2015 - 11:33 am</div>
<p>Thanks!<br />
Well, if you can tolerate its bitter taste while chewing the stem, you can surely consume it that way. Because Guduchi is attributed with Rasayana (anti aging, rejuvenative) qualities, it can be taken for longer times without any hesitation. Herbs with Rasayana qualities, such as Amla and Guduchi can be taken for long.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-81605' data-commentid="81605" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-81605" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<li id="comment-82437" class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/6a890418ef3d9293ce41de7b04034550?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/6a890418ef3d9293ce41de7b04034550?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Karthik</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">03/05/2015 - 9:49 pm</div>
<p>Dear Dr Hebbar, Which is the best Medicine for Diabetes, if levels are around 350, if Guduchi itself is not sufficient, then which other medicine should be taken, along with this</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-82437' data-commentid="82437" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-82437" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Karthik" aria-label='Reply to Karthik'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<ul class="children">

<li id="comment-85468" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">30/06/2015 - 6:44 pm</div>
<p>As per my experience, if the sugar levels are above 350, it is very difficult to bring down the blood sugar levels with Ayurvedic medicines. Very high doses of medicines will be required, for which you need to consult an Ayurveda doctor in person. You will also need to follow a very strict diet and lifestyle habits.<br />
Read more about Ayurvedic management of diabetes &#8211; <a href="https://www.easyayurveda.com/2013/11/25/madhumeha-ayurvedic-understanding-diabetes-mellitus/" rel="ugc">https://www.easyayurveda.com/2013/11/25/madhumeha-ayurvedic-understanding-diabetes-mellitus/</a></p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-85468' data-commentid="85468" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-85468" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>

<li id="comment-87919" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even thread-odd thread-alt depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">20/08/2015 - 10:16 pm</div>
<p>Hi, Giloy is also attributed with Rasayana (anti ageing properties). Hence, assuming that you do not have altering blood sugar levels, you can take Giloy juice for about 2 &#8211; 3 months of time, along with Amla juice or individually.</p>

<li id="comment-90392" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even thread-even depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">09/10/2015 - 10:23 pm</div>
<p>I have not seen a reference of boiling giloy stem in milk. You can boil it in water &#8211; 2 teaspoons of water, boiled in a cup of water, reduced to half a cup, filtered and consumed once a day, to enjoy most of the benefits explained above.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-90392' data-commentid="90392" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-90392" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>

<p>It is termed as Rasayana &#8211; anti ageing herb, good for long term use. No side effects, in its normal dose.</p>

<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-100394' data-commentid="100394" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-100394" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to B B Srivastava" aria-label='Reply to B B Srivastava'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<ul class="children">

<li id="comment-100418" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar odd alt depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">13/07/2016 - 5:16 pm</div>
<p>The best way is to make Decoction / Kashaya of its dried stems &#8211; 10 grams of dried stem coarse powder, add 2 cups of water, boil and reduce to half a cup, filter and drink when fresh and hot, once a day, 30 minutes after food.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-100418' data-commentid="100418" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-100418" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>

<li id="comment-103050" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1">
<div class="media">

<div class="media-body">

<div class="meta-comm">12/09/2016 - 10:20 pm</div>
<p>Hi, most of the Ayurvedic tablets contain one or the other preservatives. If it is for short term usage (4 &#8211; 6 weeks), there are no side effects.</p>

<li id="comment-103616" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar odd alt depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">25/09/2016 - 9:30 pm</div>
<p>Hi, Just the guduchi powder might not be sufficient. I believe a combination of guduchi, Neem, Patola (pointed gourd),Vasa etc will be very effective in Hepatiitis C treatment.<br />
Guduchi is also available in capsule form.</p>

<li id="comment-105948" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar odd alt thread-even depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">15/11/2016 - 6:53 pm</div>
<p>It is dried under sunshade. Pounded to small pieces. &#8211; 1 tablespoon of powder of stem is added with 1 cup of water, boiled for 2 minutes, filtered. This filtered liquid is consumed once per day, before or after food, for 2 months time.</p>

<h4 class="media-heading">Jayanti</h4>
<div class="meta-comm">30/11/2016 - 9:09 pm</div>
<p>According to me Gilloy has nothing to do with Asthma. Instead, Turmeric, Ginger, Garlic, Onion, Black pepper, Long Pepper, Laving, Cinnamon, Vasa, Tulsi etc would help more. Some of them can be taken with warm milk/water &amp; honey. </p>
<p>Cut red onion in the 1 mm slice and put it in the mask, wear it and simply breath deeply . You can also put some garlic paste along with onion in the mask. I had tried it successfully on my mother.</p>

But when i googled, came to know that one of the side effects of giloy is over stimulation of auto immune system which leads to auto immune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis. Is this true? if so, what remedies u suggest for my case?</p>

<li id="comment-139215" class="comment odd alt thread-even depth-1">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/d0376d1021539756f9b552f5f115df19?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/d0376d1021539756f9b552f5f115df19?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>

<p>Dear Doctor, if giloy enhances immune system, will it be counter productive in auto immune diseases? Or can it be taken? It may or may not help in case of Corona. But can it trigger the immune response which is being seen in Corona in form of aggressive immune response in young patients?</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-139215' data-commentid="139215" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-139215" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Natasha Sharma" aria-label='Reply to Natasha Sharma'>Reply to comment</a> </div>

<ul class="children">

<li id="comment-139252" class="comment byuser comment-author-jannihebbar even depth-2">
<div class="media">
<div class="pull-left"><img alt='' src='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=80&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g' srcset='https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/89f394d69908853de00de8bc65f8ff3f?s=160&#038;d=identicon&#038;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-80 photo' height='80' width='80' decoding='async'/></div>
<div class="media-body">
<h4 class="media-heading"><a href="https://www.easyayurveda.com/contact-details" class="url" rel="ugc">Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)</a></h4>
<div class="meta-comm">17/05/2020 - 9:09 pm</div>
<p>Giloy is more useful to correct the immune system (Immuno-modulator), than boosting immune system.<br />
If used in correct dose for the right amount of time, aggressive immune response can be avoided with Giloy or other immune boosting herbs such as Ashwagandha.</p>
<a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='#comment-139252' data-commentid="139252" data-postid="16045" data-belowelement="comment-139252" data-respondelement="respond" data-replyto="Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)" aria-label='Reply to Dr J V Hebbar MD(Ayu)'>Reply to comment</a> </div>
</div>
</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ul><!-- .children -->
</li><!-- #comment-## -->

// Special handling for in-app browsers that don't always support new windows
(function() {
function browserSupportsNewWindows(userAgent) {
var rules = [
'FBIOS',
'Twitter for iPhone',
'WebView',
'(iPhone|iPod|iPad)(?!.*Safari\/)',
'Android.*(wv|\.0\.0\.0)'
];
var pattern = new RegExp('(' + rules.join('|') + ')', 'ig');
return !pattern.test(userAgent);
}

if (!browserSupportsNewWindows(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera)) {
document.getElementById('af-form-2129766958').parentElement.removeAttribute('target');
}
})();
</script><script type="text/javascript">

<script type="text/javascript">
// Special handling for in-app browsers that don't always support new windows
(function() {
function browserSupportsNewWindows(userAgent) {
var rules = [
'FBIOS',
'Twitter for iPhone',
'WebView',
'(iPhone|iPod|iPad)(?!.*Safari\/)',
'Android.*(wv|\.0\.0\.0)'
];
var pattern = new RegExp('(' + rules.join('|') + ')', 'ig');
return !pattern.test(userAgent);
}

if (!browserSupportsNewWindows(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera)) {
document.getElementById('af-form-2129766958').parentElement.removeAttribute('target');
}
})();
</script><script type="text/javascript">

<div class="gtranslate_wrapper" id="gt-wrapper-48838156"></div><style type="text/css">
img.sb-lazy-img {
background:url(https://www.easyayurveda.com/wp-content/plugins/sb-woocommerce-infinite-scroll//assets/img/lazyload.gif) no-repeat center;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function($) {
'use strict';
var w = $(window);
var sbwis;
sbwis = {
init: function() {
var pagination_type = 'infinite_scroll';
if(w.width() <= '767') {
var pagination_type = 'load_more_button';
}
if(pagination_type == 'ajax_pagination') {
$('body').on('click', '.woocommerce-pagination a', function(e) {
e.preventDefault();
var href = $.trim($(this).attr('href'));
if(href != '') {
if(!sbwis.msieversion()) {
history.pushState(null, null, href);
}
sbwis.onstart();
$('.woocommerce-pagination').before('<div id="sb-infinite-scroll-loader" class="sb-infinite-scroll-loader "><img src="https://www.easyayurveda.com/wp-content/plugins/sb-woocommerce-infinite-scroll//assets/img/ajax-loader.gif" alt=" " /><span>Loading...</span></div>');
$.get(href, function(response) {
if(!sbwis.msieversion()) {
document.title = $(response).filter('title').html();
}
var html = $(response).find('ul.products').html();
$('ul.products').html(html);
var html = $(response).find('.woocommerce-pagination').html();
$('.woocommerce-pagination').html(html);
$('.sb-infinite-scroll-loader').remove();
sbwis.onfinish();
var scrollto = 0;
if($('html, body').length) {
var scrollto = $('html, body').offset().top;
}
$('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: scrollto }, 500);
$('ul.products li.product').addClass('animated fadeIn').one('webkitAnimationEnd mozAnimationEnd MSAnimationEnd oanimationend animationend', function() {
$(this).removeClass('animated fadeIn');
});
});
}
});
}
if(pagination_type == 'load_more_button' || pagination_type == 'infinite_scroll') {
$(document).ready(function() {
if($('.woocommerce-pagination').length) {
$('.woocommerce-pagination').before('<div id="sb-infinite-scroll-load-more" class="sb-infinite-scroll-load-more "><a sb-processing="0">Load More Products</a><br class="sb-clear" /></div>');
if(pagination_type == 'infinite_scroll') {
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more').addClass('sb-hide');
}
}
$('.woocommerce-pagination').addClass('sb-hide');
$('ul.products li.product').addClass('sb-added');
});
$('body').on('click', '#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a', function(e) {
e.preventDefault();
if($('.woocommerce-pagination a.next').length) {
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').attr('sb-processing', 1);
var href = $('.woocommerce-pagination a.next').attr('href');
sbwis.onstart();
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more').hide();
$('.woocommerce-pagination').before('<div id="sb-infinite-scroll-loader" class="sb-infinite-scroll-loader "><img src="https://www.easyayurveda.com/wp-content/plugins/sb-woocommerce-infinite-scroll//assets/img/ajax-loader.gif" alt=" " /><span>Loading...</span></div>');
$.get(href, function(response) {
$('.woocommerce-pagination').html($(response).find('.woocommerce-pagination').html());
$(response).find('ul.products li.product').each(function() {
$('ul.products li.product:last').after($(this));
});
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-loader').remove();
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more').show();
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').attr('sb-processing', 0);
sbwis.onfinish();
$('ul.products li.product').not('.sb-added').addClass('animated fadeIn').one('webkitAnimationEnd mozAnimationEnd MSAnimationEnd oanimationend animationend', function() {
$(this).removeClass('animated fadeIn').addClass('sb-added');
});
if($('.woocommerce-pagination a.next').length == 0) {
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more').addClass('finished').removeClass('sb-hide');
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').show().html('No more products available...').css('cursor', 'default');
}
});
} else {
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more').addClass('finished').removeClass('sb-hide');
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').show().html('No more products available...').css('cursor', 'default');
}
});
}
if(pagination_type == 'infinite_scroll') {
var buffer_pixels = Math.abs(50);
w.scroll(function () {
if($('ul.products').length) {
var a = $('ul.products').offset().top + $('ul.products').outerHeight();
var b = a - w.scrollTop();
if ((b - buffer_pixels) < w.height()) {
if($('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').attr('sb-processing') == 0) {
$('#sb-infinite-scroll-load-more a').trigger('click');
}
}
}
});
} },
onstart: function() {
; },
onfinish: function() {
sbwis.trigger_load();
; },
msieversion: function() {
var ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
var msie = ua.indexOf("MSIE ");
if (msie > 0) // If Internet Explorer, return version number
return parseInt(ua.substring(msie + 5, ua.indexOf(".", msie)));

return false;
},
lazyload_init: function() {
w.scroll(function () {
sbwis.trigger_load();
});
sbwis.trigger_load();
},
trigger_load: function() {
$(".sb-lazy-img").each(function () {
sbwis.lazyload($(this));
});
},
lazyload: function(e) {
var threshold = Math.abs(50);
var a = e.offset().top;
var b = a - w.scrollTop();
if ((b - threshold) < w.height()) {
var h = e.attr("sb-lazy-src");
e.attr("src",h).removeAttr("sb-lazy-src").removeClass('sb-lazy-img');
}
}
};
sbwis.init();
sbwis.lazyload_init();
})(jQuery);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" id="dokan-form-validate-js-extra">

<script type="text/javascript" id="cmplz-cookiebanner-js-after">
/* <![CDATA[ */
if ('undefined' != typeof window.jQuery) {
jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
$(document).on('elementor/popup/show', () => {
let rev_cats = cmplz_categories.reverse();
for (let key in rev_cats) {
if (rev_cats.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
let category = cmplz_categories[key];
if (cmplz_has_consent(category)) {
document.querySelectorAll('[data-category="' + category + '"]').forEach(obj => {
cmplz_remove_placeholder(obj);
});
}
}
}

let services = cmplz_get_services_on_page();
for (let key in services) {
if (services.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
let service = services[key].service;
let category = services[key].category;
if (cmplz_has_service_consent(service, category)) {
document.querySelectorAll('[data-service="' + service + '"]').forEach(obj => {
cmplz_remove_placeholder(obj);
});
}
}
}
});
});
}
/* ]]> */
</script>

<!-- Register/Unregister the AWeber Service Worker -->
<script async src="https://www.easyayurveda.com/wp-content/plugins/aweber-web-form-widget/php/../src/js/aweber-wpn-script.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
var aweber_wpn_vars = {
plugin_base_path: 'https://www.easyayurveda.com/wp-content/plugins/aweber-web-form-widget/php/',
register_aweber_service_worker: '',
};
</script>

</body>

</html>
